title: Rebel
description: PROMISED TO LOVEAlaina McMann is stunned by the brazen sensuality of Union major Ian McKenzie. Suddenly she is in his arms, engulfed by desire. Her honor compromised, Alaina's options are either scandal or marriage--to a man who will soon be her bitter enemy.SWORN TO BETRAYAs the Civil War turns brother against brother, Ian is ordered to capture the South's most notorious spy, the Moccasin. She is beautiful, deadly. And she is his wife. Duty demands she hang, yet Ian's heart demands another choice...a magnificent rebellious love that can destroy or save them both.
author: Heather    Graham
